name: Snake Walk
description:
Snake Walk is unique and very addictive puzzle game. Challenge your mind trying to find the right way through the maze!

*****

Test your skills now with 100 unique levels. Solve each puzzle and unlock even more advanced levels. Can you finish the puzzles fast enough and get the maximum of 3 stars on every level!? Improve your logic skills while you spend hours of fun, playing Snake Walk!

Features:

- 100 levels with increasing difficulty
- iPhone 6 Plus Support
- Game Center leaderboards
- Retina support

Snake Walk is a mind game made specially for all puzzle fans - boys and girls of all ages!

We hope you enjoy playing Snake Walk!

PLEASE NOTE! Snake Walk is completely free to play, but it contains items which can be purchased for real money. If you do not wish to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.
